title: Pennsylvania Firm Recalls Pork Rib Products Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 30, 2015 Clemens Food Group, a Hatfield, Pa. establishment, is recalling approximately 42 pounds of uncooked pork rib products due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products may contain...
